title: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, instead of returning an HTTP error 404, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404 indicating that the requested resource was not found.
SR:
1. Download and unzip http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL.
4. Verify that the response is an HTTP error 404.
